Description.Text: These hip, chic and boutique serviced apartments have stunning views from the 2nd, 18th, 19th and 20th floors of the iconic, restored 1960s Rotunda in Central Birmingham, just 3 minutes from New Street Station. Staying Cool apartments at the Rotunda are very close to the Bullring, right in the thriving heart of Birmingham. Each Staying Cool apartment has floor-to-ceiling windows offering a breathtaking panorama of the city. Special features include free Wi-Fi, an Apple Mac entertainment system, a Bose iPod player and a Poggenpohl kitchen with cool appliances.
Located within a couple of minutes walk of the Bull Ring Shopping centre.

Mini - These apartments are located between the 17th-19th floor of the refurbished Rotunda and feature scenic city views through floor-to-ceiling windows. A king-size bed with a memory foam mattress is provided, with bathrobes, spa products and a walk-in shower included in the private bathroom. An Apple Mac, iPod dock and free Wi-Fi are also included in the apartment. The fully equipped Poggenpohl kitchen features a Gaggia coffee machine. Room Facilities: Iron, Work Desk, Ironing Facilities, Seating Area, Washing Machine, Heating, Carpeted Floor, Interconnecting Room(s) available, Sofa, Shower, Bath, Hairdryer, Bathrobe, Bathroom Amenities, Toilet, Bathroom, TV, DVD Player, Satellite TV, LCD /Plasma /Flat-screen TV, iPod Docking Station, Tea/Coffee Maker, Refrigerator, Microwave, Dishwasher, Kitchen, Electric Kettle, Kitchenware, View (sea, garden, landmark, etc.) Room Size: 36 square metres
Maxi - Sleeps four, spacious two bed apartment free Wi-Fi Apple Mac entertainment system with i-Tunes iPod dock/Sky TV Desk and separate dining table European king-size beds/blackout curtains in bedrooms/hand-blended aromatherapy spa products complimentary breakfast well-equipped Poggenpohl kitchen with dishwasher and washer / dryer Gaggia espresso machine with fresh coffee & local milk/oranges for the juicer Daily maid service (optional) Hairdryer, iron, ironing board
